Provisions of PL 102-568 for Current-Law Pension
Under
Public Law (PL) 102-568
, any current-law pension in excess of the $90 per month and withheld due to nursing home care must be deposited in a revolving fund at the VA medical facility furnishing nursing home care.
These funds are made available to help defray the operating expenses of the medical facility.
